Item.name: Ragged Flat Hat
Item.description: A soft, round, flat-crowned hat made of synthetic fiber.

Item.name: Ragged Beanie
Item.description: A worn knit cap designed to provide warmth in cold environments.

Item.name: Ragged Cowboy Hat
Item.description: A synthetic fiber cowboy hat.

Item.name: Ragged Cap A
Item.description: A worn kepi with a stiff, rounded visor.

Item.name: Ragged Cap B
Item.description: A worn kepi with a stiff, rounded visor.

Item.name: Ragged Beret
Item.description: A worn, round, flat-crowned hat made of synthetic fiber.

Item.name: Ragged Ushanka A
Item.description: A worn fur cap with ear flaps designed to provide warmth in cold environments.

Item.name: Ragged Ushanka B
Item.description: A worn fur cap with ear flaps designed to provide warmth in cold environments.

Item.name: Ragged Capt's Cap A
Item.description: A token of the Captain's unquestionable authority.

Item.name: Ragged Capt's Cap B
Item.description: A token of the Captain's unquestionable authority.

Item.name: Ragged Officer's Cap A
Item.aliases: Ragged Asscap A,Ragged Asshat A,Ragged Assistant's Cap A,Ragged Officer's Cap
Item.description: A token of the Officer's questionable authority.

Item.name: Ragged Officer's Cap B
Item.aliases: Ragged Asscap B,Ragged Asshat B,Ragged Assistant's Cap B
Item.description: A token of the Officer's even more questionable authority.

Item.name: Ragged Officer's Beret
Item.aliases: Ragged Assberet,Ragged Asshat C,Ragged Assistant's Beret
Item.description: A token of the Officer's undeniable authority.

Item.name: Ragged Security Beret
Item.description: A fancy beret worn by both submarine and outpost Security Enforcers.

Item.name: Ragged Safety Helmet
Item.description: A headgear worn to protect the head from injuries.

Item.name: Ragged Welding Helmet
Item.description: A headgear worn to protect the head and eyes from injuries.

Item.name: Ragged Ballistic Helmet
Item.description: While the helmet won't offer adequate protection against most of the inhabitants of the subsurface ocean, it can be extremely useful if there are traitors on board.

Item.name: Ragged Vest
Item.description: A sleeveless worn garment that covers the torso.

Item.name: Ragged Sweater
Item.description: A worn garment covering the torso and arms.

Item.name: Ragged Jumper
Item.description: A worn garment covering the torso and arms with a muff sewn onto the lower front.

Item.name: Utilitу Vest
Item.description: An utility vest used mostly by engineers. It has pockets for carrying any extra gear an engineer might need.

Item.name: Ragged Utility Vest
Item.description: An utility vest used mostly by engineers. It has pockets for carrying any extra gear an engineer might need.

Item.name: Ragged Utility Jumpsuit
Item.description: The fire-resistant fabric offers some protection against fires. Plenty of pockets for carrying any extra gear a mechanic might need.

Item.name: Ragged Doc's Coat
Item.description: A worn standard issued garment given to Medical Doctors.

Item.name: Ragged Armor Vest
Item.description: While a ballistic vest won't offer adequate protection against most of the inhabitants of the subsurface ocean, it can be extremely useful if there are traitors on board.

Item.name: Ragged Prisoner Jumpsuit A
Item.description: The usual garment given to detainees by the Coalition.

Item.name: Ragged Prisoner Jumpsuit C
Item.description: The usual garment given to detainees by the Coalition.

Item.name: Ragged Trousers
Item.description: A pair of worn trousers.

Item.name: Ragged Cargo Trousers
Item.description: A pair of worn cargo trousers.

Item.name: Plastic Bag
Item.description: It's commonly found inside cargo crates. Usually used to carry small items but sometimes used in other, questionable activities.

Item.name: Hogtie Set
Item.description: This is a makeshift set of copper coil and a holed plastic bag made to temporarily restrain an individual.
